The project is a stationary website that showcases a range of products like pens, notebooks, and art supplies. It provides a platform for users to browse and explore various stationary items, although it currently does not support online purchasing.
The site aims to inform visitors about the company's offerings and establish a professional online presence for potential customers seeking electrical services.
